Module fypmsV2
Package controllers

Class RequestController

java.lang.Object
controllers.RequestController
public class RequestController extends Object
The RequestController class contains methods to handle requests made by students and supervisors, such as submitting requests and approving/rejecting them. It also includes methods to get all requests, get requests by id, and get all requests by requestor.

      Returns:

    • submitRequest

      public boolean submitRequest(ProjectRequest request)
      Submits a project request made by a student, sets the project as reserved, and adds the request to the request collection.
      Parameters:
      request - the ProjectRequest object to submit
      Returns:
      true if the request was submitted successfully, false otherwise

      Returns:
